Spark Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Spark::SpCopyToTexture3dSliced 3D Copy To Texture (CTT) feedback mechanism via OpenGL
Spark::SpCopyToTexture3dFbSliced 3D Copy To Texture (CTT) feedback mechanism via OpenGL
Spark::SpCopyToTextureFbCopy To Texture (CTT) feedback mechanism via OpenGL
Spark::SpGlManagerStatic manager class for interfacing with OpenGL
Spark::SpGlslFragmentProgramInterface for a GLSL Fragment Program
Spark::SpGlslManagerStatic manager class for interfacing with GLSL
Spark::SpGlslVertexProgramInterface for a GLSL Fragment Program
Spark::SpGpuProgramAbstract base class for a GPU program
Spark::SpGridSgMulti-resolution grid-based stream geometry
Spark::SpMaths< Real >Static utility class for mathematical constants
Spark::SpMatrix< N, Real >NxN Matrix base class for vector algebra
Spark::SpMatrix2< Real >2x2 pMatrix class for vector algebra
Spark::SpMatrix3< Real >3x3 Matrix class for vector algebra
Spark::SpMatrix4< Real >4x4 Matrix class for vector algebra
Spark::SpMultiTexturedGridSgMulti-resolution grid-based stream geometry w/ multi-texturing support
Spark::SpMultiTexturedQuadSgQuad-based stream geometry w/ multi-texturing support
Spark::SpParameterStorage class for multiple data types for use with GPU programs
Spark::SpParameterSetContainer class for parameters used with GPU programs
Spark::SpQuadSgQuad-based stream geometry
Spark::SpReference< ClassType >Reference class with garbage collection for supporting shared objects
Spark::SpResourcePathResource utility class for querying a file system and loading datafiles
Spark::SpStreamBasisAbstract base class for a stream basis for spectral synthesis
Spark::SpStreamBufferA multi-format OpenGL GPU resident data buffer and render-to-texture (RTT) interface
Spark::SpStreamFeedbackAbstract base class for a stream feedback mechanism for returning results
Spark::SpStreamGeometryAbstract base class for generating a data stream by rendering geometry
Spark::SpStreamInputAbstract base class for an input stream for loading/generating a data stream
Spark::SpStreamOperatorAbstract base class for a stream operator which modifies an input stream
Spark::SpStreamOutputAbstract base class for an output stream used fo saving/viewing stream data
Spark::SpStreamViewerStream viewer output class for visualizing a data stream
Spark::SpStringString utility class for character data
Spark::SpTexturedGridSgMulti-resolution grid-based stream geometry w/ texturing support
Spark::SpTexturedQuadSgQuad-based stream geometry w/ texturing support
Spark::SpTimerBasic Timer for profiling and retrieving performance/time info
Spark::SpTuple< N, Real >N-Dimensional data class with support for vector mathematics
Spark::SpTuple2< Real >2D tuple data class with support for vector mathematics
Spark::SpTuple3< Real >3D tuple data class with support for vector mathematics
Spark::SpTuple4< Real >4D tuple data class with support for vector mathematics
Spark::SpTurbulenceOpTurbulence stream operator to be used with a stream basis class
Spark::SpVertexNoiseSbNoise generating stream basis which operates on vertex data
Spark::SpWindowAbstract base class for a graphical display window
